Class Level2FlyingBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board.FlyingBoard
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board.Level2FlyingBoard
public class Level2FlyingBoard extends FlyingBoard
The Level2FlyingBoard class extends FlyingBoard to represent a specialized flying board with an additional hourglass mechanic.

This class manages the state and behavior of a level 2 flying board, including position tracking for the hourglass and a custom credit distribution system based on player ranking.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board.FlyingBoard

    gameClientNotifier, ranking, runLenght

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Level2FlyingBoard()
    Constructs a new Level2FlyingBoard with: A run length of 34 units (passed to the superclass constructor). The hourglass positioned at the start (position 0). A fixed list of credits awarded based on player ranking: 12, 9, 6, 3.

  • Constructor Details

    • Level2FlyingBoard

      public Level2FlyingBoard()
      Constructs a new Level2FlyingBoard with:
      • A run length of 34 units (passed to the superclass constructor).
      • The hourglass positioned at the start (position 0).
      • A fixed list of credits awarded based on player ranking: 12, 9, 6, 3.

      Specified by:
      getPrettiestShipReward in class FlyingBoard
      Returns:
      the reward value as an integer for the prettiest ship.

    • getCreditsForPosition

      public int getCreditsForPosition(Player player)
      Returns the number of credits assigned to a player based on their current ranking. The ranking is determined by the getCurrentRanking() method.
      Specified by:
      getCreditsForPosition in class FlyingBoard
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose credit score is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the number of credits assigned to the player based on their ranking
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the player is not in the current ranking

    • insertPlayer

      public int insertPlayer(Player player)
      Inserts a player into the ranking system and assigns them an initial position. Notifies all connected game clients about the updated ranking.
      Specified by:
      insertPlayer in class FlyingBoard
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to be inserted into the ranking
      Returns:
      the current size of the ranking after the player is added
